targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "mdt_filesinfo_used" WHERE "fs_name" = 'scratch' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "aggregation.cpu-average.cpu.system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s), "fqdn" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "aggregation.cpu-average.cpu.system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s), "fqdn" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(first("value"), 1s) FROM "md_stats" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s), "optype" fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(first("value"), 1m) FROM "ost_stats_bytes" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s), "optype" fill(null)
SELECT sum("sum") FROM "ost_brw_stats_rpc_bulk_samples_bynode" WHERE "field" = 'write_sample' AND "size" = '1_pages' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("sum") FROM "ost_brw_stats_rpc_bulk_samples_bysize" WHERE "field" = 'write_sample' AND "size" = '256_pages' AND "fs_name" =~ /^$fsname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s)
SELECT sum("sum") FROM "ost_brw_stats_rpc_bulk_samples_bysize" WHERE "field" = 'write_sample' AND "size" = '512_pages' AND "fs_name" =~ /^$fsname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s)
SELECT sum("sum") FROM "ost_brw_stats_rpc_bulk_samples_bysize" WHERE "field" = 'write_sample' AND "size" = '1K_pages' AND "fs_name" =~ /^$fsname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s)
SELECT sum("sum") FROM "ost_brw_stats_rpc_bulk_samples_bysize" WHERE "field" = 'write_sample' AND "size" = '2K_pages' AND "fs_name" =~ /^$fsname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s)
SELECT sum("sum") FROM "ost_brw_stats_rpc_bulk_samples_bysize" WHERE "field" = 'write_sample' AND "size" = '4K_pages' AND "fs_name" =~ /^$fsname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s)
SELECT "sum" FROM "ost_brw_stats_rpc_bulk_samples_bynode" WHERE "field" = 'read_sample' AND "size" = '1_pages' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s)
SELECT sum("sum") FROM "ost_brw_stats_rpc_bulk_samples_bysize" WHERE "field" = 'read_sample' AND "size" = '256_pages' AND "fs_name" =~ /^$fsname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s)
SELECT sum("sum") FROM "ost_brw_stats_rpc_bulk_samples_bysize" WHERE "field" = 'read_sample' AND "size" = '512_pages' AND "fs_name" =~ /^$fsname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s)
SELECT sum("sum") FROM "ost_brw_stats_rpc_bulk_samples_bysize" WHERE "field" = 'read_sample' AND "size" = '1K_pages' AND "fs_name" =~ /^$fsname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s)
SELECT sum("sum") FROM "ost_brw_stats_rpc_bulk_samples_bysize" WHERE "field" = 'read_sample' AND "size" = '2K_pages' AND "fs_name" =~ /^$fsname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT sum("sum") FROM "ost_brw_stats_rpc_bulk_samples_bysize" WHERE "field" = 'read_sample' AND "size" = '4K_pages' AND "fs_name" =~ /^$fsname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "mdt_acctuser_samples_5m_total" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Total number of file per UID ($fsname)

targets.query: SELECT last("ost_acctuser_samples_5m") FROM "ost_acctuser_samples_5m_total" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "user_id"

list.name: fsname
list.query: show tag values from "ost_stats_samples" with key = "fs_name"
